lyrics:
Teenage Prayer Lyrics[Verse 1]
My friends all know it
How I adore him
I've whispered to angels
What I'd do for him
He is the answer
To a teenage prayer

[Verse 2]
He won't go steady
The crowd has told me
But I keep praying
To have him hold me
Why won't you listen
To a teenage prayer?
[Bridge]
I wait by the window at seven
And chill when my thrill passes by
His kiss could send me to Heaven
Into his arms I could fly

[Verse 3]
My girlfriend, Betty
Tells me he's lazy
But I know Betty
Loves him like crazy
He is the answer
To a teenage prayer

[Outro]
Yes
He is the answer
To a teenage prayerEmbed
